message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.IR. 

This paper deals with cross-lingual alignment of neural sentence embeddings, which is a topic related to natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses various approaches for alignment, including transfer learning and mapping, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG and cs.AI). Additionally, the paper evaluates the performance of the alignment approaches using intrinsic and extrinsic evaluations, which are methods used in information retrieval (cs.IR) and computer vision (cs.CV).
